channel.title: A few questions
channel.description: Hi, I'm new to the game and I really like it. I have some questions about the mechanics. 1) How does the apostle passive work? Its like priest passive? 2) When someone is in prison has immunity as in Town of Salem? 3) Can the Prince in the Prison kill anybody who has night immunity? 4) If the Cult leader converts someone the same night as Paladin is investigating him, does Paladin kill him? 5) Can there be more Noble couples in the game at once? 6) When the Cult leader uses Blood of Mithras, will the observer see him as a visiting cult member? 7) I noticed that a few Wiki information is incorrect. Can you fix it? Thank you for the answers and apologize for bad English.

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
ye I know I just think no one is supposed to revive after an execution or lynch.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
It does die, it just revives

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
^^ I think even the reaper surviving is a bug but I’m pretty sure that’s how it goes.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Don’t think so, I think only Reaper can survive being killed by the Prince.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Elymas
item.description:
And save him from Prince?

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
The night immunity for priest doesn’t save him from being lynched, no.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: Elymas
item.description:
I asked for his selfrevive

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
1. I think it should still work if you’re jailed. I don’t get your second question though. If the priest is lynched, they can talk to the dead like any other dead person.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: Elymas
item.description:
1. Does the Priest’s Devoted work even when the Prince executes him?And work when he was lynched?

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: Elymas
item.description:
Thank you I think the description of abilities in the game and the wiki is not very detailed and can lead to various similar issues

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
1. Yep.
  2. Yep.
  3. Yep, the execution goes through night immunity.
  4. I think not
  5. There will always be two nobles; no more, no less (Unless the game has less than 10 players, then there will be none)
  6. I don’t think it does. Not sure though.
  7. If you find mistakes in the wiki you can either inform us in the Discord or change it yourself (As long as you’re not trolling there is no problem with that)

I hope I was helpful =) Have a nice day. Also I would suggest you join the discord if you haven’t already by clicking here.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: Elymas
item.description:
Hi, I’m new to the game and I really like it. I have some questions about the mechanics.

  1. How does the apostle passive work? Its like priest passive?
  2. When someone is in prison has immunity as in Town of Salem?
  3. Can the Prince in the Prison kill anybody who has night immunity?
  4. If the Cult leader converts someone the same night as Paladin is investigating him, does Paladin kill him?
  5. Can there be more Noble couples in the game at once?
  6. When the Cult leader uses Blood of Mithras, will the observer see him as a visiting cult member?
  7. I noticed that a few Wiki information is incorrect. Can you fix it?
    Thank you for the answers and apologize for bad English.

Read full topic
